content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Upper Thomson" subzone – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(November 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Subzone of Bishan Planning Area in Central Region, Singapore **Upper Thomson** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 汤申上段, [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language): அப்பர் தாம்சன்) is a subzone within the planning area of [Bishan, Singapore](/wiki/Bishan,_Singapore), as defined by the [Urban Redevelopment Authority](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority) (URA). Its boundary is composed of Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1 in the north; Marymount Road in the east; Braddell Road and Lornie Road in the south; and the planning area of [Central Water Catchment](/wiki/Central_Water_Catchment) in the west. This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Upper Thomson (subzone)
